title: Octoclip
description:
Octoclip is a universal clipboard tool that enables instant content syncing and transfer between iOS, Android, Windows, and macOS devices. Whether it's text, images, or files, you can simply copy on one device and immediately paste on another.
It prioritizes privacy with a local-first approach, keeping your data primarily on your devices. It also supports syncing through local networks or cloud services (OneDrive, Google Drive, etc.) to accommodate different usage scenarios.
